title: To Riot: Riot Blitzcrank Skin!
body:
Dear Riot,
 
Your are currently offering this skin in bundle in riot league game client. Why cant I buy just one instead of bundle. I do not wish to purchase bundle as I main support and I do not play rest of the champions you are offering in that bundle. If you could make this individual I would be able to buy one. I been waiting for this particular skin for a very long time as currently I do not own any other blitz skin and I main blitz and thresh support. If you could do this I would really appreciate. 

Best Regards,
SSW Thresh

I wish you were right pal, but Riot doesn't work like that. I joined a tournament that happened in February. A team clearly full of plat's rofl stomped everyone, tourny host didn't want to give them prizes. Up to now i'm still trying to get my team's second place prize.

And the thing about your mom not letting you spend that much money, I get it 100%. I'm in Asia right now so I end up having to spend 3 times as much for the same amount. T_T

30 dollars for 1350 is alot T_T. 

And I feel like i've played with you before. Your name is really familiar (not thinking about the skin)

I cannot afford the entire bundle as my mom wont let me spend that much money on game. I am sure if riot read this they might make riot blitzcrank skin individual.
